label: hasHedSection
Description: Indicates this schema contains this section.
Comment: Maps a HedSection into a HedSchema.

label: inHedSection
Description: Indicates what section the element appears in.
Comment: Maps a HedEntity into its appropriate HedSection class.

label: hasUnitType
Description: Associates a HedUnit with its category (HedUnitClass).
Comment: Maps HedUnit into HedUnitClass, allowing tools to place a unit in its correct grouping.

label: defaultUnits
Description: The default units to use if the placeholder has a unit class but the substituted value has no units.

label: relatedTag
Description: A HED tag that is closely related to this tag. This attribute is used by tagging tools.

label: suggestedTag
Description: A tag that is often associated with this tag. This attribute is used by tagging tools to provide tagging suggestions.
